verses.roman:
śuddha-bhāve kariba kṛṣṇera ārādhana
nirantara sadainye kariba nivedana

synonyms: śuddha-bhāve—in a purified state of mind; kariba—I shall do; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ārādhana—worship; nirantara—constantly; sa-dainye—in humility; kariba—I shall make; nivedana—request.
translation: "I shall worship Kṛṣṇa in a purified state of mind. I shall constantly petition Him in humbleness.
